typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/5K/*']) ~> in5Kcsv
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/5K/*']) ~> in5Kavro
in5Kcsv sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'5K/avro[n]',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAvro
in5Kavro sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['5K/flights5K.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeCSV
